title: IT'S BEEN A BLOOMIN' YEAR NOW RITO
body:

WHERE IS MY DANK BATTLE OF AWESOMENESS OF DENYING 1RP OF MANLY HONOR?!?

YOU DO 1K WINS STILL, YOU SHANT HIDE THIS DUEL OF FATES FROM ME!!1!

I WANT MY CHALLENGE TO DENY THAT 1RP OF DANK MIGHT DANG IT!! (┛◉Д◉)┛彡 ┻━┻
